title: Marvel Iron Man 3 Motorized Battle Charger Vehicle
features: Iron Man Motorized Battle Charger vehicle pops automatically into Attack Bot mode
Pull it back and let it go
description: Is there any way Iron Man could be any more powerful? Only if he had Transformers technology. This incredible Iron Man Motorized Battle Charger vehicle races into action, then pops automatically into Attack Bot mode for a powerful, armor-blasting attack. Pull it back to rev it up, then let it go to race. Amp up your Iron Man missions with the Motorized Battle Charger vehicle. Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.
